766100.name: NASCAR Heat 2 - Free December Toyota Pack
766100.description:
Toyota Racing believes in giving back to their fans! This NASCAR Heat 2 – December Toyota Pack is FREE, and it includes some top-tier Toyota Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series, NASCAR XFINITY Series, and NASCAR Camping World Truck Series paint schemes! In total, you'll get 14 new Toyota paint schemes and 1 new Toyota challenge.

Expect paint schemes like the following:

MENCS:
Matt Kenseth #20 DEWALT Finale (Homestead)
Martin Truex Jr. #78 BPS Ducks Unlimited (Bristol)
…
NXS:
Daniel Suarez #18 Comcast / Juniper (Chicagoland)
Matt Tifft #19 Fanatics (New Hampshire)
…
CWTS:
Ryan Truex #19 AISIN (Chicagoland)
Myatt Snider #51 Liberty Tax Service (Kentucky)
766100.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
